MainPage.title: A Crypto Wallet For Everything Onchain
MainPage.subTitle: All your tokens, DeFi positions, NFT collections, and transaction history across all major networks.
MainPage.swapSendStore: Swap, Send, and Store your Crypto with Uroboros and pay the fee in any token you want!
MainPage.multipleChainsOneWallet: Multiple chains, one wallet. No more switching.
MainPage.blockchainSupport: Supports millions of assets and NFTs on blockchains.
MainPage.secure: Securely store, swap, and send Crypto and NFTs across 300+ blockchains.

wallet.title: Multiple chains, one wallet. No more switching.
wallet.text: Manage your crypto assets between different networks without bridging them and simply access your funds on all EVM chains from our wallet.

nogas.title: Gasless swaps
nogas.text: Pay the fee in any token you want! You don't need to buy native tokens to pay gas.

swap.title: Swap and bridge It just works
swap.text: Cross-chain swaps, endless DEX and bridge liquidity, and Flashbots protection from sandwich attacks and MEV.

controlled.title: Controlled by you Supported by us–µ
controlled.text: You are in full control of your funds, and we never have access to your private keys.

mev.title: MEV Redistribution
mev.text: Feel like a market maker by reducing spreads and making MEV profits when an opportunity arises

import.title: Import existing wallets and dApps
import.text: Instantly import your wallets from MetaMask, Wallet, Coinbase Wallet, Phantom and more.

footer.description: UROBOROS one place for all your crypto. Securely store,swap, and send Crypto and NFTs across 300+ blockchains.
